arts.ttl: Man City and Tottenham to compete for signing of Aston Villa star
arts.sum: Man City and Tottenham have competed closely on the pitch in recent seasons, and they are set to do so on the transfer front in 2026. Both clubs want to add defensive reinforcements to their squad, and they have set their sights on a particular target: Ezri Konsa. arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Manchester City – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Aston Villa welcome Manchester City to Villa Park today, aiming to continue their remarkable resurgence. Furthermore, they could potentially make Premier League history in the process. After a winless start to the season, Villa have now won three consecutive league games. Impressively, a fourth straight win today would see them equal a top-flight record. It […] The post Aston Villa vs Manchester City – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Manchester City – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Two of the Premier League’s most in-form sides clash on Sunday as Aston Villa host Manchester City at Villa Park. Unai Emery’s Villa are seeking a fourth consecutive league victory after a remarkable turnaround in form. arts.sum: Manchester City travel to Villa Park on Sunday looking to maintain their position near the top of the Premier League against an Aston Villa side enjoying a resurgence.
